front.title: Unapproved Draft IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Corrigendum to IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks-Part 16: Air Interface for Fixed Broadband Wireless Access Systems (Revision of IEEE Std 802.16-2001; IEEE Std 802.16c-2002, and IEEE Std 802.16a-2003)
